Class MBassadorEventPublisher

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AcrossEventPublisher, net.engio.mbassy.bus.common.ErrorHandlingSupport, net.engio.mbassy.bus.common.GenericMessagePublicationSupport<AcrossEvent,net.engio.mbassy.bus.publication.SyncAsyncPostCommand<AcrossEvent>>, net.engio.mbassy.bus.common.IMessageBus<AcrossEvent,net.engio.mbassy.bus.publication.SyncAsyncPostCommand<AcrossEvent>>, net.engio.mbassy.bus.common.ISyncMessageBus<AcrossEvent,net.engio.mbassy.bus.publication.SyncAsyncPostCommand<AcrossEvent>>, net.engio.mbassy.bus.common.PubSubSupport<AcrossEvent>, net.engio.mbassy.bus.common.RuntimeProvider

    public class MBassadorEventPublisher
extends net.engio.mbassy.bus.MBassador<AcrossEvent>
implements AcrossEventPublisher

    EventBus implementation for the AcrossContext. Allows for publishing AcrossEvent instances to all registered listeners. Also provides the necessary functionality to register and unregister listeners.

    Note: JDK proxies are not supported, meaning the target object of the proxy will be registered as event handler instead of the proxied bean.
